summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 3.05, 3.19, 26.1, 26.2, 26.3, 27.1, 27.2, 27.3, 28.1, and 24.4 of and adding new Sections 26.21, 26.22, 26.23, 26.4, 27.11, 27.12, 27.84, 28.2, 28.3, 28.4, 28.41, 28.42, 28.43, 28.5, 28.51, 28.52, 24.47, and 24.48 to the Zoning Ordinance (86300) relating to administrative determinations by the Hearing Examiner and Board of Adjustment, text and map amendments, council conditions uses and planned unit developments.
